title: Wrangler Men's 20X No. 42 Vintage Bootcut Jeans
description: SLIM FIT. These vintage-style bootcut jeans are constructed with a slimmer fit through the seat, thigh and leg for a tailored look. This jean sits lower on the waist for a comfortable fit.

VINTAGE STYLING. Vintage finishing has an instant broken-in appeal. These men's 20X jeans offer a classic look complete with signature Vintage finishes. Dressed up or down, these bootcut jeans have a contemporary western look and feel.
BUILT TO LAST. Made with durable materials, these jeans won't hold you back. Available in both original and stretch denim - choose a pair that best fits your needs.
HEAVY-DUTY HARDWARE. Finished with a zipper fly, button closure and embroidered back pockets.
FIVE-POCKET STYLE. This 5-pocket boot cut jean is made with (2) front pockets, (2) back pockets and (1) coin pocket.
